# Manage Subscription & Billing

On the Billing page you manage your CeleroPress subscription, view your current usage and can change your plan or cancel your subscription.

## Access the Billing Page

1. Click **Account** in the left navigation
2. Select **Billing** from the menu
3. You will see an overview of your current plan and usage

[Screenshot: Navigate to Account > Billing]

## Your Current Plan

### Overview

At the top of the Billing page you'll see:

- **Current Plan**: STARTER, BUSINESS or AGENTUR
- **Monthly Price**: â‚¬49, â‚¬149 or â‚¬399
- **Included Features**: Contacts, Emails, AI Words, Team Members, Storage
- **Account Type**: Regular (paying), Beta, Promo or Internal

[Screenshot: Plan overview with features]

### The Three Plans Compared

**STARTER (â‚¬49/month)**
- 1,000 Contacts
- 2,500 Emails per month
- 50,000 AI Words per month
- 1 Team Member
- 5 GB Cloud Storage
- Email Support

**BUSINESS (â‚¬149/month)**
- 5,000 Contacts
- 10,000 Emails per month
- âˆž Unlimited AI Words
- 3 Team Members
- 25 GB Cloud Storage
- Access to Journalist Database
- Email + Chat Support
- 1h Video Onboarding

**AGENTUR (â‚¬399/month)**
- 25,000 Contacts
- 50,000 Emails per month
- âˆž Unlimited AI Words
- 10 Team Members (+ â‚¬20/month for additional)
- 100 GB Cloud Storage
- Access to Journalist Database
- Email + Chat + Phone Support
- Dedicated Onboarding

## Monitor Usage

### Current Consumption Values

Below your plan you'll see detailed usage statistics:

- **Emails sent**: How many emails you've sent this month
- **Total contacts**: Number of all contacts (Publishers + Journalists)
- **AI words used**: Consumption by AI assistants
- **Cloud storage**: Used storage space for media
- **Active team members**: Number of active users in your organization

[Screenshot: Usage statistics with progress bars]

### Color Coding

- **Blue (0-90%)**: Normal usage
- **Yellow (90-100%)**: Limit almost reached
- **Over 100%**: Limit exceeded (will continue into next billing period)

> **Tip**: Use the **Refresh button** (3-dot menu top right) to load the most recent usage data.

### Unlimited Features

In BUSINESS and AGENTUR plans, AI words are unlimited. These are shown as "âˆž Unlimited".

## Change Plan

### Upgrade or Downgrade

1. Click **Change Plan** at the top right
2. Select a new plan (STARTER, BUSINESS, AGENTUR)
3. Review the changes:
   - **Upgrade (â¬†)**: Active immediately, prorated billing
   - **Downgrade (â¬‡)**: Only possible if new limits are not exceeded
4. Click **Change Plan**

[Screenshot: Plan change modal with three tiers]

### Downgrade Restrictions

A downgrade is only possible if your current usage doesn't exceed the limits of the new plan.

**Example**: You cannot switch from BUSINESS to STARTER if you already have:
- More than 1,000 contacts
- More than 1 team member invited
- More than 5 GB storage used

In this case, the system will show you a warning message with the exact violations.

> **Solution**: First reduce your usage (delete contacts, remove team members, delete media) before performing the downgrade.

### Immediate Effect

- **Upgrade**: Activated immediately, you pay prorated for the remaining month
- **Downgrade**: Becomes active at the end of the current billing period

## Manage Payment Methods & Invoices

### Stripe Customer Portal

For all payment-related management tasks, CeleroPress uses the Stripe Customer Portal:

1. Click **Manage Payment Methods** in the "Management" section
2. You'll be redirected to Stripe (in a new tab)
3. In the portal you can:
   - Change or add payment methods
   - Download invoices
   - Update billing address
   - View payment history

[Screenshot: Stripe Customer Portal button]

### Download Invoices

In the Stripe Customer Portal, under **Invoices**, you'll find all your past invoices:

- Download as PDF
- Automatic email delivery after each charge
- Billing address editable

## Cancel Subscription

### Cancellation at Period End

1. Click **Cancel Subscription** (red button)
2. Confirm the cancellation in the dialog
3. Your subscription will expire at the end of the current billing period

[Screenshot: Cancel button and confirmation dialog]

### What Happens After Cancellation?

- You retain **full access** until the end of the paid period
- A **yellow warning banner** shows you how many days remain
- After expiration, your account is **deactivated** (data remains preserved)
- You can **reactivate** the subscription at any time

### Reactivate Subscription

If you want to undo your cancellation:

1. On the Billing page you'll see the status "Expires on [Date]"
2. Click **Reactivate Subscription**
3. The cancellation is immediately reversed
4. Your subscription continues normally

> **Important**: Reactivation is only possible **before** the period expires. After that, you need to start a new subscription.

## Special Account Types

### Beta Accounts

If you were invited as a beta tester:

- **Full access** to all features (equivalent to AGENTUR plan)
- **No payment required**
- **Unlimited usage** for all limits
- Blue info banner with "ðŸŽ‰ Beta Tester"

### Promo Accounts

If you redeemed a promo code:

- Full access according to the promo plan
- **Expiration date** is displayed (if limited)
- After expiration: Conversion to regular plan required

### Internal Accounts

For CeleroPress team members and demo accounts:

- Unlimited access
- No billing functions visible

## Manually Sync Usage

### Refresh Function

If your usage statistics don't appear current:

1. Click the **3-dot menu** at the top right
2. Select **Refresh Usage**
3. The system recounts all resources:
   - Contacts in database
   - Team members
   - Media storage
   - Email sends (from logs)
   - AI words (from logs)

[Screenshot: 3-dot menu with "Refresh Usage"]

> **Tip**: Usage is normally updated **automatically**. Use this function only if values seem implausible.

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Can I change my plan at any time?**

Yes, you can upgrade at any time. Downgrades are possible if your current usage doesn't exceed the new limits.

**How does prorated billing work?**

With an upgrade, you only pay the difference for the remaining days in the current month. From the next month, the full new price applies.

**What happens if I exceed my limit?**

If you exceed a limit (e.g., emails), sending is stopped. You'll receive a notification recommending an upgrade.

**Will my data be deleted upon cancellation?**

No, your data remains preserved. Upon reactivation within 90 days, all data is available again. After 90 days of inactivity, data is archived.

**Can I receive invoices with company details?**

Yes, in the Stripe Customer Portal under "Billing Information" you can add your company address and VAT ID. All future invoices will include this data.

**What's the difference between accountType and tier?**

- **accountType**: How you pay (regular, beta, promo, internal)
- **tier**: What feature set you have (STARTER, BUSINESS, AGENTUR)
